website_summaries.verdict: An affordable body powder in a container that will look nice on your bathroom counter or vanity. Just be sure to handle the fragile packaging with care.
pros: Has a refreshing lavender scent that most users find appealing
Comes with a large, fluffy powder puff
You get a generous amount of powder for a low price
cons: While the canister is pretty, it is flimsy and the lid is prone to cracking

customer_reviews.title: I had to toss this product without using it
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a nice container, with a nice powder puff, but the scent was a bit nauseating. I wanted to like it. I need a product like this since Emeraude powder is no longer available but this is not the scent for me. It's a powerful scent - definitely not subtle. I was strongly reminded of the air fresheners used in public restrooms at freeway rest stops. Trouble is, you don't know that until you open the Amazon carton but it wasn't an expensive gamble. I'm still looking for a nicely scented feminine body powder because this one was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: After several shipping delays my powder was finally delivered. The plastic container of powder was in a common ziploc baggie shipped in a padded envelope. I'm happy they thought to put it in the baggie because the plastic container was smashed and it would have been a mess upon opening the shipping envelope. I was able to read the product label and it was talc and a bunch of chemicals. The fragrance is not that of lavender probably because there are no natural scents in it, just chemical analogs. Had I known. No need for me to ask for a replacement, there is no way I would put that chemical stew on my body. Fool me once...
customer_reviews.author: exxxperiencedd

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the generous quantity of powder. Powder is of good quality, scent is fresh, and powder puff is soft. Unfortunately, the container arrived in a plain envelope with no packing material. Container and lid were both badly cracked and unusable. Luckily I had saved a previous container, so I carefully transferred the powder over from the damaged container. Not an easy task. Great product, poor shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Murph Out

customer_reviews.title: Good talc, not so good package
customer_reviews.text: Have used this twice now and I love it. Scented talc after a shower is amazing. The scent is very light but nice. It's just enough. It gets only 4 stars because of the packaging. The lid neither screws on or snaps on, so I use a rubber band to hold it on in case it gets knocked over. The poof is a little to large with no handle and there's isn't a sifter at the top to just get a little talc. I purchased a smaller poof w a handle and considering looking for a better container. The talc itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Allison

customer_reviews.title: Nice lilac perfumed body powder
customer_reviews.text: I like using perfumed powder in the Summer and it is very hard to find any of it anymore. I used to order Women's Body Powders from AVON but they stopped making them. I WANT THEM TO BRING THEM BACK!!!! I am glad I found this fragrance. I don't use too much, too often so it should last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent & Nice price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder and the price. I am at that age where hot flashes cause some sweating in the chest area and that's why I use powder. I dab it on before putting on my bra and life is so much better. Bath & Bodyworks has powder, 1.5oz for $12. I didn't want to get baby powder and I can't use cornstarch products (causes a rash). So I am very happy to have found this product. Nice scent and nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Made me Break out in a ugly red rash
customer_reviews.text: The dusting powder made me break out in a rash after a couple weeks of use. It has now been over a week and it is still not healing up. Be very careful if you have sensivity to ingredients (most of them sound like chemicals and artificial ingredients). Otherwise the dusting powder smelled OK and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't normally take the time to review an item so small. I was skeptical that the smell of the powder may or may not be okay. I even ordered some baby powder just in case. But it's actually quite nice! I can't speak for everyone's sense of smell, but it's not over-powering.
customer_reviews.author: drumrgrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scented powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder is fantastic. It reminds me of days gone by, with the pleasant lavender scent and the cool feel. I love using this when it's hot outside or just after a bath.
customer_reviews.author: patty gardner

customer_reviews.title: Shipping could improve
customer_reviews.text: Powder smells so nice. Seller needs to ship in boxes tho. The bag it was sent in was intact but the lid was broken in 4 pieces. Shipping was quick. Thank you! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: georgia

customer_reviews.title: Very light scent, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The powder has almost no lavender scent, very disappointing. The lid comes off very easily, resulting in spilled powder every time I use it. The lid doesn’t screw on or latch shut. I can’t take it when traveling as powder would spill every where. The powder itself is very fine and soft, I liked the feel of it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover is too loose
customer_reviews.text: First time I picked it up to use the powder, the cover came off in my hands and the container dropped to the floor, spilling the powder all over. Sigh. The box is pretty though. I'll use it for keeping little trinkets in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dusting Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I used all the time, please do not take it of the market ever. Love that is made in America!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Zorrilla

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is great, but the container is small and mine is almost gone already. I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent wish the puff was softer to adsorb more but works great
customer_reviews.author: fortheloveofdogs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Poor product. No fragment. TOP flimsy. Cannot keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: bea emmons lingley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy, good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I have been trying to pick this up at the store, but they don't carry it anymore so I was very happy to find it on Amazon. I used this powder in the at college and now I find myself needing it again! Hot Summers + gym days = hard to stop sweating...but I can't use baby powder so Lavender is the perfect soft scent.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Grandma needed a puff
customer_reviews.text: Grandma needed a body puff with a container and was very pleased with this order. It was just as described on the order and smelled wonderful. A+
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling powder...
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell... I like the reusable container... i would definitely recommend this to anyone who loves dusting powder.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Perry

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The package was cracked and broken when it arrived. Puff is flat, not at all what I expected. Does not smell much like lavender.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.D.

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN CONTAINER....Powder everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered damaged. The entire case was racked in half with powder all over the bag it was packaged in. You cannot return this,so I’m warning anyone who is interested in buying this it to....unless you want to deal with a mess! VERY UNHAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: nyy928

customer_reviews.title: This powder smells fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic smell and great value. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this body powder. I have used this for several years and intend to continue using it. I especially like the very mild scent which is often hard to find in a body powder.
customer_reviews.author: GrandPuppy

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Scent is not overpowering as I have found i other products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This powder doesn't smell quite like I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda southern

customer_reviews.title: Nice Easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: Just like what I used to have as a kid! Smells great and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Yalanda Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lavender powder
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh long lasting scent of the lavender. Powder puff is very thin and not very fluffy but the powder is wonderful, light and refreshingly calm. I gave it 5 stars but suggest replacing the puff.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Richardson

customer_reviews.title: This is not a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I found that the container was cheap plastic , the foil was open with powder all over the inside. The powder is too light and does not smell like lavender. I will be following the steps to return it. Christine Wolf
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Lid falls off and powder goes everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Container needs a plastic sifter between the powder and the puff. You open the lid and pick up the puff and powder is everywhere...very wasteful and messy...not easy to use...just a big mess. the powder and sent are great...the container sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool...literally!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dusting powder! It goes on light, smells heavenly and helps me feel fresh during this hot and sticky summer. I enjoy it so much, I've all ready bought a second one to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Hootie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy package
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not screw but fits loosely on top. I have forgotten this fact twice. The scent is quite nice, just fix the package. I placed two rubber bands over the whole container.
customer_reviews.author: lisa c.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my mom for Valentine's Day. She loved it. The size is larger than the usual 4 oz. making it a great value. The scent Lavender and Vanilla is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Procopio

customer_reviews.title: It's LAVENDER  !
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the light scent. It's just right for me. It's incredibly "soft" -- comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is highly recommended and worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. I will come to your house next time
customer_reviews.author: Neelura B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So nice to use after a bath. Scent is soft not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant odor
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t smell like lavender, it smells sweet and unpleasant . Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Witt

customer_reviews.title: dusting powder
customer_reviews.text: the smell is great and the container is beautiful. definitely will buy again. good price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: marricad

customer_reviews.title: The texture is nice, but I personally did not care for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The texture is nice, but I personally did not care for the smell. It was a bit "old fashioned" smelling for my taste, but it could be just my preference
customer_reviews.author: Zannah

customer_reviews.title: The container and puff work great for my body powder though
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I bought this just for the container and powder puff. Threw the talc powder in the yard. Would not suggest any woman use talc on her body because of the risks. The container and puff work great for my body powder though :)
customer_reviews.author: AKV

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for someone. They loved it. Smells great no potpourri fake smell. Nice container, the powder doesn't clump.
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: great except for talc
customer_reviews.text: incredible value for the price. a nice light scent. the only problem is that the main ingredient is Talc and I've heard that talc is unhealthy. The powder puff is perfect, light and fluffy
customer_reviews.author: A.O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Nana loved it
customer_reviews.text: My Nana really liked this scented powder, it's a light and very nice scent. It doesn't set her off like certain fragrances, a very gentle product.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I miss my Powderpuff from years ago and this one does not disappoint. My only wish is that the lid would fit better and it held more powder.
customer_reviews.author: Murlyn

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I got it for lol. Love lavender
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scent
customer_reviews.text: Price very high, but i can't find in stores anymore and i really like it
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: this powder is one of the calmest I have used ...
customer_reviews.text: this powder is one of the calmest I have used. The sent is not going to overwhelm you and the calming of the lavender prevents any rashes that other powders have. I will not only use this but gift it to my female friends and family
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a delightful scent that lasts. Will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Knapp

customer_reviews.title: I really like the light Lavender fragrance and the powder puff applicator
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a timely manner, which is appreciated. I really like the light Lavender fragrance and the powder puff applicator.
customer_reviews.author: The duffer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly pleased...
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream! Rich, lovely light hint of Lilac and rose. My new go to!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance of this powder is perfect - very mild and pleasant. The price is also surprisingly nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the condition of the product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of this product but Two of the three lids were cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Lovato

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Contained TALC so unable to use, Some of the covers were broken. Missed my return date
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder & puff.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Just like the old days. A nice fluffy puffer and soft, sweet smell. Also, lavender is a calming fragrance for after bath before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Les Braden

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I have reacquainted myself with dusting powder and I'm enjoying it so much. This is lovely and feels very nice on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: love this pouder.
customer_reviews.text: love this. have bought 2 as add on. they don't sell it where I live. thanks. love it
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: The lid doesn't attach and the puff has no handle ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn't attach and the puff has no handle. The smell is ok. I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: It smells too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the fragrance. It smells too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The puff is cheap and the container design makes it very messy to apply the powder. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: LCACDS

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if you are to remove foil covering, or put holes in it.
customer_reviews.text: The power has a great scent, but presentation of how to use this powder not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law loves body powder and she is loving the lavender scent.
customer_reviews.author: PearlBird

customer_reviews.title: It has a long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: To keep the body dry in the most moist areas of your body
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Lid was cracked
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a low rating because the lid was cracked. Scent is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl LaDart

customer_reviews.title: smells like an old lady
customer_reviews.text: cover does not close tight does not smell like a good lavender
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful smelling powder with a great dusting pad. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: wend

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, just wish it wasn't talcum. Corn starch option would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: LahxLah

customer_reviews.title: Made my Nanny’s day
customer_reviews.text: It was for my 99 year old nanny. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Black

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that great fragrance is ok not a fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: Bertsmom

customer_reviews.title: ... (cornstarch)powder with camomile & lavender so this was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I have used baby (cornstarch)powder with camomile & lavender so this was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: powder
customer_reviews.text: i love this powder i have been using it for years and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: kimberlymar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed no lid and powder all over the box
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: It was in pieces! There was nothing around it ...
customer_reviews.text: It was in pieces! There was nothing around it, no packing slip, nothing. The top was in multiple pieces. I will never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Wrong scent
customer_reviews.text: I like the poof, but the powder scent isn't what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Korinne K

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love the powder but the container is so delicate and cracks easily
customer_reviews.author: Spydede

customer_reviews.title: Soft, smooth & fragrant
customer_reviews.text: This is like putting on silk! So soft and smooth! The fragrance is soft and heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Absurd price
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product when it was priced much lower. The plastic container and thin puff obviously contained the cost allowing a reasonable price. When attempting to reorder, I was surprised to find that the price had risen so drastically that more expensive, well known and better packaged powders with plusher puffs are now less expensive than this product. This sold for 2.99 a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: skiouting

customer_reviews.title: Nice Summer Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I don't need any perfume with this beautifully scented powder! It's so light and cool for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size, nice smell. However it is a little pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good scent
customer_reviews.text: Odd smelling lavender powder. I just learned that you can buy this exact product at Walmart for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell this powder, I use it after my shower and I feel fresh all day long. My daughters all love it so I have had to add it to my orders so I could give some to each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This does not smell like lavender at all. Get some lavender essential oil and unscented body powder instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Joeyen-Waldorf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of lavender. I buy this all the time from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This item is available at the local big box store for a lot less. I was looking for dusting powder WITHOUT talc. When I checked the ingredient list, unfortunately TALC was listed first. I was very disappointed as I thought I had checked carefully prior to placing my order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received this and don't like it. I think I got Tranquil Breeze with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and don't like it. I think I got Tranquil Breeze with a Lavender sticker on it. Smells like soap and the container is blue. Poof doesn't have a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years, until they quit selling it locally, so I was thrilled to find it on Amazon. It's the cheapest dusting powder I've found, goes on well, and the best scent. They have two other scents, all are great. Hopefully I will be able to continue buying it here. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kiya05

customer_reviews.title: Not really lavender-y
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a number of lavender scented products, and to me this does not smell very much like lavender, just a vague fruity scent. Plus, I realized after I purchased it that the primary ingredient is talc which some research has suggested may be a carcinogen. So I will not be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Lavender is Pleasantly Scented
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lavender scent. It is pleasant smelling but not an over-powering scent. It was packaged well and there was no leakage. The only thing I would recommend is that the puff have a ribbon on the back for ease in picking it up to use it. The puff does allow for the powder to adhere to it well and fits within the container well. The powder is fine and not clumpy. For the price, it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: EvaluatorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Pretty container
customer_reviews.text: Although the lavender container is really pretty, the scent of this dusting powder isn't anything like lavender. It's really not a scent I like. I'm going to keep it and use it for the powder but I'll probably dilute it with something with a scent that I like. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J.Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, subtle scent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic powder. I love the gentle lavender scent. It’s enough to detect easily, but not at all strong or overwhelming. I’m back here buying my second container, I like it that much. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Imp4

customer_reviews.title: Just Right Scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a body dusting powder. I love the just right lavender scent. The scent is not to weak or sharp like other powders. I have read others complain about the package. I don't know what they're talking about the package fits the product. I've had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells really good
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I love this powder. I find myself putting it on more than once a day on some days because it smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find scented dusting powder with a puff in the stores, so I opted for this and it's really terrific. The scent is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Powers

customer_reviews.title: Simple Dusting powder
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good value for a simple dusting powder set. Once the original powder was gone I refilled with my favorite powders.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Well packaged and arrived quickly. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Just what was wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was for a friend. She has ordered it more than once so she is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: This is THE lavender powder!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was looking for a quality lavender powder and although i looked at more expensive powders this one had such great reviews! It's perfect!!! Great powdery lavender smell and fresh! What a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Schwertly

customer_reviews.title: Light fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. A really light scent. I use it before bed and I am able to relax faster. It would be nice if the puff had an elastic handle. I've dropped it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: char col

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: is very good powder, but price is a little high, if not for free shipping I could not afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quantity and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how big this would be. It is a nice sizeable container, about the width of my hand. Very fragrant, but not overpowering. Would be wonderful gifts and at this price, you could give to several people. It is hard to find nice dusting powder at a reasonable price. Well here it is!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Crites

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: It is okay the smell isn't too strong but the puff needs to be improved, after using only a few times it has already started to disintegrate, the puff also has no place to hang onto it and it would be wonderful if they could sew just a little strip of ribbon to the top of it.
customer_reviews.author: vpat

customer_reviews.title: Liked the scent
customer_reviews.text: Liked the scent but it arrived cracked and the seal was torn also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dusting Powder, Lavender, 5 ounces
product_meta.description: Our Perfumed Dusting Powder is silky and light, with a delicate scent
feature_bullets: Includes a large plush body puff for easy all-over body application.
Delicate lavender scent with a touch of vanilla.
